_header: In some time weren in England kings swith rife
Subjects: Oswin, saint, life of; saints’ lives
_description: Life of St. Oswin in one MS of the South English Legendary

Bod779.First Lines:
In somtyme weren in ingelonde kingus swyþe ryuefor so ich
                    finde in bok I wroȝt at onus þer weren fyue…
Bod779.Last Lines:
…þat we after oure ending mot to him come& wende to
                    þe ioye þer þat he doþ wone
Bod779.Attributed Title: Seint oswin þe king þe holy marter (f. 208)
Bod779.Editions:
Horstmann,  Carl. 
             “Des Ms. Bodl. 779 jüngere Zusatzlegenden zur südlichen
                Legendensammlung.” 
             Archiv für das Studium der neueren Sprachen und
                Literaturen
         82 (1889): 307-422: 369-78.
